item.title: Cofiguration server
item.description: View logs ngnix $ cat /var/log/nginx/error.log # OR $ sudo tail -n 20 /var/log/nginx/error.log Check configuration nginx $ nginx -c /etc/nginx/nginx.conf -t Reset service nginx on Ubuntu $ sudo systemctl restart nginx Reload configuration of service nginx on Ubuntu $ sudo systemctl reload nginx Assign permissitions for user of nginx on Ubuntu $ chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/domain.com/subdomain/* Copy project to folder WWW public Nginx $ cp -rL /root/projects/project1/dist/public /var/www/domain.me/subdomain/project Fix permissions for user of nginx on Ubuntu $ chmod -R 755 */ # or 751 Fix Permissions Folder $ chmod -R 644 */* # Fix Permissions Files Copy project to folder WWW public Nginx and Fix permissions $ cp -rL /root/projects/Personal/demo_cobrandoAG/app/dist/pwa /var/www/tech-andgar.
